pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OverviewAn events framework that allows for logging and processing of Django models custom events.# Setup## Requirements* Python 3.9+## InstallationInstall it directly into an activated virtual environment:```text$ pip install django-events-framework```# UsageAfter installation, the framework can be used by:```textINSTALLED_APPS = [ ..., "events_framework"]```
